synopsis.text: Recruited by her childhood friend, the prodigious pilot Kylie soars through the skies as a key member of the Kotobuki Squadron, an all-female team of mercenaries. In a barren frontier where survival hinges on the exchange of goods, these skilled aviators protect precious cargo from the relentless pursuit of air pirates. With their trusty Hayabusa fighters, the squadron's diverse members engage in thrilling dogfights under the command of their strict but beautiful leader. In this desolate world, the Kotobuki Squadron's aerial battles resonate as a symbol of hope and resilience, ensuring the safe delivery of vital resources to the isolated communities below.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
